passive.name: CONCUSSIVE BLOWS
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) CONCUSSIVE BLOWS
                                Braum's attacks apply Concussive Blows for 4 seconds. Once the first stack is applied, allied champion's attacks also stack Concussive Blows.Upon reaching 4 stacks, the enemy is stunned for 1.25/1.5s/1.75s seconds and takes 32 magic damage (+12  ).Enemies cannot receive stacks for 8 seconds after being stunned, but take an additional 7 magic damage (+2,2  ) from Braum's attacks.

q.name: (Q) WINTER'S BITE
q.description:
(Q) WINTER'S BITE
 10/9/8/7s   55/60/65/70 
                                
                                
                                Launches ice that deals 79 magic damage (60/120/180/240 + 3% ) and slows the enemy hit by 70% for 2 seconds.Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

w.name: (W) STAND BEHIND ME
w.description:
(W) STAND BEHIND ME
 13/12/11/10s   55/60/65/70 
                                
                                
                                Leaps to an ally, Braum and the ally gain 10 Armor (10 + 10/12/14/16% bonus ) and 10 Magic Resist (10/15/20/25 + 10/12/14/16% bonus ) for 3 seconds on arrival.

e.name: (E) UNBREAKABLE
e.description:
(E) UNBREAKABLE
 16/14/12/10s   35/40/45/50 
                                
                                
                                Raises his shield, intercepting projectiles for 4 seconds. Braum negates the first instance of damage from whichever direstion he faces and takes 35/40/45/50% reduced damage afterwards.Braum gains 15% Movement Speed while his shield is raised.

r.name: (R) GLACIAL FISSURE
r.description:
(R) GLACIAL FISSURE
 75/70/65s   100 
                                
                                
                                Slams the ground and opens a fissure, dealing 150 magic damage (150/250/350 + 60% ) and knocking up enemies for 1/1.25/1.5 seconds. The fissure slows enemies byÂ 40/50/60% and lasts for 4 seconds.After the first enemy champion hit, subsequent enemies are knocked up for 0.25 seconds.
